properties.name: idProperty

properties.description: Store type         Values: memory, rest         Default: memory
properties.name: nodes

methods.description: Force data items to have an id property

methods.description: Configure store retrieved data
methods.name: _setUpData

methods.name: createRemote

methods.name: fetch

methods.description: Filter store data
methods.name: filter

methods.description: Filter store data from a remote source
methods.name: filterRemote

methods.description: Get a store data item
methods.name: get

methods.name: getRange

methods.description: Get store data item from a remote source
methods.name: getRemote

methods.name: list

methods.name: remove

params.description: Store data item to be replace with
params.name: item

methods.name: replaceRemote

methods.name: setData

methods.name: sortList

params.description: Data object key to list for
params.name: key

methods.name: sortRemote

params.description: Data object key to list for
params.name: key
